It's CS:GO What is there other then sometimes toxic lobbies that you wouldn't like? It's fun and diverse. I love the event's and challenges that throw at players as it get's me hooked for hours on end! People may say it's a waste of time and you loose all your money on cases (Partially True lol) but any other game is like that, this game is one of a kind and the world knows this.

There are so many unfair things on this game.  There are some hackers and after team report, there are not any feedback for you. So you never know if hacker's get punished. And also sometimes, when all teammates kick you for no reason. You will be punished like a shit. If other company has CS or similar, I will absolutely delete this shit game.
